SingleCurve.code:
class SingleCurve:
    def __init__(self, points_file):
        import os
        dirname = os.path.dirname(__file__)

        output_file = os.environ['PIPE_BASE'] + 'rrender-single_curve.pdf'
        os.system(
            "RScript %s %s %s" %
                ( 
                    os.environ['PIPE_RENDER'] + "single_curve.R",
                    points_file,
                    output_file
                )
        )

        os.remove(os.environ['PIPE_BASE'] + "Rplots.pdf")
